amendment.description: Amendment allocates $15 million of NASA funding in the Space Shuttle Life Extension Program to develop concepts to increase crew survivability.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for space shuttle crew survival.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hall amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Hall.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hall amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
